28.ara-name: كتاب الطب عن رسول اللَّهِ صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Qatadah said:"It was narrated to me that Abu Hurairah said: 'I took three truffles, or five, or seven, and pressed them. Then I put their liquid in a bottle, and I used it on the eyes of a slave girl of mine so she was cured

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْكَمْأَةِ وَالْعَجْوَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Truffles And Al-'Ajwah
